backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a job management system for image processing with CRUD operations, rate limiting (10 jobs per user per 24h), and a multi-stage processing pipeline that tracks job status and stage results.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features recorded.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the HILSA-ART portrait drawing tutorial application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the HILSA-ART GUIDE app, mounting the React app into a root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with four routes (Home, HowItWorks, Contact, Results), a shared RootLayout with Header/Footer, ThemeProvider, and Sonner toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, navigation links, social media icons (Instagram, X, Behance), copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/GalleryView.tsx: Gallery component displaying the original photo and 5 sketch stages in a grid, with per-stage loading states, download buttons, a full-screen lightbox, and fallback to client-side canvas generation when backend images are unavailable.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header with HILSA-ART logo, desktop nav links with active state styling, a 'Start Creating' CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
React component that provides a drag-and-drop image upload interface, validates files, creates a job via the backend, tracks upload progress, and navigates to the results page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching jobs (with polling), listing user jobs, creating jobs, processing jobs, and retrying failed jobs against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for a parchment-and-ink design system.
frontend/src/lib/pencilSketchUtils.ts: Utility module that processes an image through five progressive pencil-sketch stages using grayscale conversion, Sobel edge detection, Gaussian blur, and paper grain effects, returning canvas data URLs for each stage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a validated form (name, email, message) that simulates submission and shows a toast notification, alongside contact info and social media links.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section with a five-stage portrait process overview, a scroll-to-upload CTA, and an embedded UploadInterface component with stage detail cards.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: Explains the five-stage pencil portrait drawing method in a vertical timeline layout, with each stage showing an icon, description, and detailed technique notes.
frontend/src/pages/Results.tsx: Displays job results by fetching a job by ID, handling loading/error/failed states, and rendering a GalleryView of generated pencil sketch stages with retry support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with custom fonts (Playfair Display, Cormorant Garamond, Inter), OKLCH-based color tokens (gold, ink, sidebar, chart), custom shadows, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the HILSA Art Guide app, its pending feature requests (enhanced sketch pipeline, gallery step labels, drawing guide walkthrough, HowItWorks previews), and required stage illustration assets.
